name: CommandHandler::FindById
reason: Command cannot return data (CQRS)

name: QueryHandler::Save
reason: Query cannot mutate state (CQRS)

name: Entity::Stateless
reason: Entity requires identity/state

name: ValueObject::HasIdentity
reason: Value Object cannot have identity

name: RepositoryImpl::PureFunction
reason: Repository performs I/O; cannot be pure

name: PureFunction::ExternalIO
reason: Pure function cannot perform external I/O

name: EventHandler::ReturnsValue
reason: Event handler is fire-and-forget

name: TestFunction::ModifiesProductionData
reason: Tests cannot touch production data

name: APIHandler::InternalOnly
reason: API must cross external boundary

name: Service::GlobalState
reason: Service must be stateless (DDD/Clean)

name: AggregateRoot::NoInvariants
reason: Aggregate root must enforce invariants (law alignment pending)

name: Validator::AcceptsInvalid
reason: Validator cannot accept invalid input

name: Middleware::SkipsNext
reason: Middleware must call/chain next

name: HealthCheck::Returns500WhenHealthy
reason: Health check cannot return 500 when healthy

name: GracefulShutdown::HardKill
reason: Hard kill is not graceful

name: ChaosMonkey::ImprovesStability
reason: Chaos monkey improving stability is paradox
